forceUniqueIds: Ensure tag IDs are unique within units
ignoreTagTypeMatch: Ignore tag type mismatch between source and target
discardInvalidTargets: Discard invalid targets rather than rejecting the file
writeOriginalData: Output includes original data when available
subfilterTooltip: Name of the subfilter to use for embedded content
subfilterOverwriteTargetTooltip: Should the writer always overwrite an existing target even if state is final?
